system.description:
A deep pulse is felt in the scene as magic fills it. The party is sent hurling towards the ceiling as gravity flips. They find themselves pinned to the ceiling by an intense upwards force.

There is a device in the scene that can disable the trap, but flipping it or getting to it will be difficult.

  • To climb down along a suitable surface such as a wall, a character may make a @CHECK[mig mig hard] check.

  • To attempt to disrupt it from range, a character may make a @CHECK[ins wlp hard] check.

At the end of each round each character must make a @CHECK[mig wlp easy] check or be defeated as they lose consciousness from the pressure.
